title: EvoHero: Idle Gladiators
description: EvoHero: Idle Gladiators is a clicker game where you need to click to make money, merge and upgrade the gladiators to make even more money! Have you ever wanted to be a fighter? Have you ever wanted to be a trainer? Now you can be each one of them! Manage your fighters and develop your arena to become the greatest Emperor in the history! Start your training today!
